body.name: Steam Iron for Clothes, 1750W Clothes Iron with 3-Way Auto-Off, Rapid Heating Durable Ceramic Soleplate, Iron for Clothes with 15.21oz Water Tank, Anti-calc Function, Self-Cleaning
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

features: 【Durable Ceramic Soleplate】Equipped with a tougher-than-steel ceramic-coated soleplate, the OMAIGA clothes iron ensures a smoother, faster glide across various fabrics, speeding up ironing by 30%. Its precision tip effortlessly reaches into snug areas, making it a breeze to press shirt collars and the spaces between buttons.

【Rapid and Efficient Wrinkle Removal】Powered by a robust 1750W heating system, this steam iron churns out 25g/min of continuous steam, smoothing stubborn creases with ease. The additional steam burst of up to 0.6g/shot is perfect for tackling tough wrinkles, making it a must-have for sewers, quilters, crafters, and for daily ironing routines.

【Large Capacity Water Tank】Say goodbye to frequent refills with the 15.21oz (450ml) water tank, enabling you to iron a full basket of clothes in one go. The self-clean and anti-calc functions help maintain the iron's performance by effortlessly removing limescale.

【Easy-Control Thermostat Knob】The OMAIGA iron is a breeze to operate with its versatile settings for parallel and vertical steam, as well as dry ironing. Scientifically designed steam holes ensure even steam distribution for effective wrinkle removal. Five temperature settings provide the perfect heat for all fabric types, simplifying your ironing process.

【Not A Used Iron】Each steam iron is rigorously tested pre-sale to ensure it meets our high standards—some water residue is a normal sign of our thorough testing process. Our customer service team is on standby to assist you, and we offer a one-year warranty for your peace of mind.

【Advanced Safety & Convenience】Designed with a 3-way auto shut-off, this powerful steam iron automatically powers off within 30 seconds if placed horizontally or tipped over, and within 8 minutes if left vertically without movement. For extra safety, if the iron's temperature is too low to generate steam, the auto-shut-off system will stop the water supply, preventing any drips from the soleplate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great iron works great and heats up fast .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Novice ironer that dislikes ironing rates this iron as a really good purchase.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 2023 upgraded model for $35. Only about a 1/4 of the holes are actually visible holes. Still, this iron creates far more steam than my old iron. Only using distilled waster. Ironed 3 shirts today. I am pleased with the performance of this iron. Especially the narrow pointed tip. That feature works really well with just a slight tip forward. I also see no difference in how the ceramic coated iron glides compared to my old stainless steel iron. Perhaps it's only noticeable to a daily ironer. No fears of being too hot and burning clothes as reported by many Rowenta reviews. No leaks or drips. Never used the Heavy Steam setting. The printed settings around the dial are difficult for me to see but that's kind of self explanatory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Read the sticker label
reviews.reviewText: Water in the tank threw me off, I thought it was used. The sticker right on the side says any remaining water is there because of quality control testing. Still has me worried about possible mold though. It's probably fine. The color is pretty, I got the purple one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This iron does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I needed an iron because I quilt a lot. I wanted something that would steam burst and this fits the bill perfectly. I am very pleased with the features on this iron. I love the auto shut off and the ceramic sole plate is really nice. I prefer this iron over a oliso.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the box the packaging did not look like usual from the factory packaging. It looked to me like it had been opened previously and repacked rather sloppily with the water cup just loose in the box. The sole plate cover had been removed. That said I have tried the iron and it seems to work well. I hope it this iron was someone’s returned purchase that it was not returned due to a performance problem. I guess time and use will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very smooth ironing ,love the extra size water capacity, over all, does a great job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars no lo e usado aun , acaba de llegar y al parecer es usado
reviews.reviewText: el producto vino como su hubiera sido usado , por donde se agarra como como si estuviera arrasado y con agua adentro y lo compre como nuevo no de eso en fin lo devolveré
